title: Corporate looking font, possibly custom or modified
content:
I'm looking to ID the font shown in the screen shot used for a logo on Behance [http://www.brandingserved.com/gallery/NordPoint-Corporate-Identity/10659433](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829172337/http:/www.brandingserved.com/gallery/NordPoint-Corporate-Identity/10659433 "http://www.brandingserved.com/gallery/NordPoint-Corporate-Identity/10659433")

I'm not sure if it is based off of a commercial font; modified, a custom lettering type, or an actual commercial font itself for purchase. I would appreciate suggestions that may take me to a very similar font.

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829172337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/np-font-2a_3799.jpg)
author: zerimar3

comments.content: I can't find something really close, but a further emboldened **[Serif Sans (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829172337/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=SerifSans%20-%20Bold&fid=61b73a1355ddf42241916587235b05ae&fsize=60&text=NORD%20POINT&wrap=2)** could be a convenient starting point.

fvilanakis, that's a really good find. I'm going to look it over in depth a bit later in the day. Any thoughts on what typeface is used for the word "GROUP"?

Thanks!
What the hell are all those ridiculous circles? only an idiot would draw type like that. Or someone showing an idiot client how very complicated it is to construct type.

fvilanakis, that's a really good find. I'm going to look it over in depth a bit later in the day. Any thoughts on what typeface is used for the word "GROUP"?

Thanks!

> Any thoughts on what typeface is used for the word "GROUP"?

Could be [Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829172337/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans).
Thanks Ryuk, Gill Sans it is.
Any other thoughts on what the initial font inquiry may be? Thanks!
I emailed the designer and they replied. They used Bembo as the base of this font.
